Your Sorrow Will Turn into Joy
“A*rp little*r while,*r and*r you*r will*r see*r me*r no*r longer;*r and*r again*r a*r little*r while,*r and*r you*r will*r see*r me.”*r

So they were saying, “What does he mean by ‘a*r little*r while’?*r We do not know what he is talking about.”

Jesus knew that they wanted to ask him, so he said to them, “Is*r this*r what*r you*r are*r asking*r yourselves,*r what*r I*r meant*r by*r saying,*r ‘A*r little*r while*r and*r you*r will*r not*r see*r me,*r and*r again*r a*r little*r while*r and*r you*r will*r see*r me’?*r
